description:
Aliens come to invade the Earth!  But Sergeant Keroro gets captured by a human family, the main fleet retreats and leaves him stranded, and now he`s all alone, sir!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je suis le sergent Keroro / Le sergent Keroro arrive sur Terre
Wagahai ga Keroro Gunsou de Arimasu / Keroro Daichi ni Tatsu de Arimasu
我輩がケロロ軍曹 であります / ケロロ 大地に立つ であります
